THIS CIVIL MISCELLANEOUS PETITION IS FILED
UNDER SEC.11(5) AND (6) OF THE ARBITRATION AND
CONCILIATION ACT 1996, PRAYING TO APPOINT A SOLE
ARBITRATOR IN TERMS OF PARA 21 OF PARTNERSHIP
DEED DATED 21 ST AUGUST 2015 (ANNEXURE-B) AS
APPOINTED BY ARBITRATION AND CONCILIATION
CENTRE-BANGALORE (DOMESTIC AND INTERNATIONAL)
3 RD FLOOR, EAST WING, KHANIJA BHAVAN, RACE
COURSE ROAD, BENGALURU -560 001 AND GOVERNED
BY THE ARBITRATION AND CONCILIATION CENTRE
RULES, 2012, OR APPOINT ANY OTHER SOLE ARBITRATOR
AS THIS COURT MAY DEEM FIT, CONSEQUENTLY REFER
THE DISPUTES RAISED BY THE PETITIONER TO SOLE
ARBITRATOR.
